titles.title: A bill to direct the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to issue an order with respect to Docket No. EL-85-38-000.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-8.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 16.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to issue an order that, in proceedings before the Commission taking place during the remaining license terms of certain Idaho Power Company projects, a specified Agreement regarding such projects shall not be considered by the Commission to be: (1) inconsistent with license provisions concerning project property and utilization; or (2) imprudent for certain purposes of the Federal Power Act.
